name: Feroot Security
headline: AI-powered Compliance Platform for PCI 4, CCPA, HIPAA, CIPA, 50+ laws
description: Feroot (YC W21) is the leading compliance and security platform for b2b websites that  helps you easily achieve and maintain compliance with PCI DSS 4.0.1, CCPA, CIPA, HIPAA and 50+ data privacy regulations.

founders.name: Ivan Tsarynny, Founder
founders.description: Ivan is the CEO and Co-Founder of Feroot Security. An Intelligent and automated security testing and run-time protection of the client-side of web applications. It provides an early warning, detection and management of data assets and risks. Feroot Security was awarded a number the NextAI Top Venture Award by NextCanada, 2019 Comet TOP 5 Cybersecurity Startups in Canada by Ingram Micro and Microsoft.

#  Make payment pages PCI DSS 4 compliant and secure 
Feroot GRC AI automates website’s security and compliance programs to meet requirements of PCI DSS 4, HIPAA, CIPA, CCPA/CPRA, GDPR, and 50+ laws and standards.
[ Start Free Website Assessment ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>) [ Schedule a Demo ](https://www.feroot.com/</schedule-a-demo/>)
![cartoon of hands holding binoculars](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Homepage-hero.svg)
  * PCI DSS 4.0.1 Req. 6.4.3 and 11.6.1 
  * HIPAA Rules for Online Tracking Technologies 
  * CCPA/CPRA, CIPA, GDPR and GLBA 


![Gusto logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/gusto-company-logo.svg)
![Forbes media company logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/forbes-media-company-logo.svg)
![The Motley Fool logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/the-motley-fool-logo.svg)
![Aristocrat logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Aristocrat-logo.svg)
![AT&T Cybersecurity logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/att-cybersecurity-logo.svg)
![Web security network diagram by Feroot](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/web-security-network-infrastructure-illustration.png)
![Web security network infrastructure illustration](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/web-security-network-infrastructure-illustration-mob.svg)

##  Be confident that your customers are safe while using every web page and web form on your website. 
![Security collaboration platforms](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/security-collaboration-platform-1024x1024.png)
###  Feroot AI: Your All-In-One Website Security and Compliance Platform 
Most websites today rely on third-party scripts and tracking technologies. However, this leaves your business vulnerable. Unauthorized parties may be collecting sensitive customer data, putting you at risk of compliance violations, penalties, and lawsuits.
Feroot’s client-side web security platform gives you complete visibility and control over your website’s data. Automatically detect and block unwanted trackers, malicious scripts, and data exfiltration attempts. Stay ahead of evolving threats like Magecart attacks and maintain continuous compliance with PCI DSS 4, HIPAA, GDPR, and 50+ more regulations.
[ Start Free Website Assessment ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>) [ Schedule a Demo ](https://www.feroot.com/</schedule-a-demo/>)
##  See What’s Possible For You With Feroot: 
![Isometric representation of key compliance frameworks including HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/compliance-regulations-overview-visualization-1024x1024.png)
###  Stay Ahead of Privacy Compliance Violations 
Identify every third-party pixel, product and script that has access to or is accessing your customers’ private information and session data.
Ensure that only approved vendors, trackers, and JavaScript scripts access your user data.
Easily comply with:
  * HIPAA Use of Online Tracking Technologies by Covered Entities and Business Associates.
  * PCI DSS 4.0.1: Requirements 6.4.3 and 11.6.1
  * The 2023 GLBA Safeguard Rules and COPPA.
  * CCPA/CPRA, Washington MHMD, CIPA and 30+ U.S. State privacy and Anti-wiretapping laws.
  * GDPR, PIPEDA, Australian Privacy Act, FADP, U.K. DPA, DORA.


![World map highlighting data locations and transfers with statistics on cookies](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/global-data-transfer-and-privacy-control-interface-1024x1024.png)
###  See What Auditors and Litigators Will See on Your Website 
Address compliance requirements at ease and prepare for audits for compliance with HIPAA Rules, CCPA/CPRA, MHMD, GDPR, PCI DSS 4.0.1, and more:
  * Discover and inventory all data assets, including sensitive PII, PHI, IIHI, PCI cardholder data, NPFI and personal information.
  * Receive notifications of for privacy and compliance risks.
  * Generate detailed audit trails reports for continuous compliance.


![Web application security layers graphic with scripts and trackers](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cybersecurity-alerts-stacked-layers-illustration-1024x1024.png)
###  You Will See What Traditional Tools Can’t See 
SAST, DAST, IAST, security scanners and other CI/CD tools are blind to user session-level client-side JavaScript threats, attacks, and data leaks when your customers are using your production website.
  * Identify and block malicious scripts and unauthorized data access.
  * Receive real-time alerts for policy violations and suspicious activity.
  * Get easy to read analysis report of every script, library and data transfer POST/GET request.


![Web application security layers graphic with scripts and trackers](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Client-side-web-protection-Feroot-Deliver-Secure-and-Compliant-Online-Services-1024x1024.png)
###  Ensure All Public-facing and User-authenticated Pages are Secure and Compliant 
Protect every webpage and online form on your website from data leaks, privacy invasions, and client-side attacks like Magecart, digital e-skimming, and supply chain threats of front-end code and client-side environment of your websites.
  * Gain complete visibility and prioritize risks in minutes.
  * Uncover vulnerabilities, weaknesses, and compromises, including those in third-party products.
  * Protect PII, PHI, PCI data, NPFI and user session information on your website.


  * ![Slack logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/slack-communication-platform-logo.png)
  * ![PagerDuty logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/pagerduty-cloud-incident-management-logo.png)
  * ![Splunk logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/splunk-data-analysis-platform-logo.png)
  * ![ServiceNow logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/servicenow-cloud-platform-logo.png)
  * ![Logz.io logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/logz.io-cloud-monitoring-platform-logo.png)

  * ![Amazon CloudWatch logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/amazon-cloudwatch-monitoring-tool-logo.png)
  * ![AWS CloudWatch Logs logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/aws-cloudwatch-logs-service-logo.png)
  * ![API configuration settings icon](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/api-configuration-settings-icon.png)


###  Integrate With Your Existing Tools 
Receive alerts, tickets, and security telemetry directly in your security and compliance tools. 
##  Ready to get your website protected? 
###  1. Start a Free Website Assessment 
Get your website analyzed to know exactly what trackers, scripts and vendors are on your website and what data they access so you can stay ahead of risks and privacy violations. 
[ ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>)
###  2. Review Results and Recommendations 
You will see everything on a video call with our team. They will walk you through all findings, insights and recommendations. 
[ ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>)
###  3. Launch Feroot and Get Protected 
It’s very easy! You will get everything set up and configured in Feroot web platform by our team without you having to do anything. 
[ ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>)
##  Why companies trust Feroot 
“A day doesn’t go by that you don’t hear about a new JavaScript-based attack on a company’s website or web application. We’re seeing attackers pivoting from traditional server-side attacks to client-side attacks. **To protect our business from server-side threats, we needed to enhance our client-side security capabilities to stay ahead of the threat.** ”
![gusto logo](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/gust_logo.png)
[ Read the case study ](https://www.feroot.com/<https:/www.feroot.com/resources/securing-the-client-side-to-proactively-manage-cyber-risk/>)
![Frederick “Flee” Lee](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/gusto_photo.png)
Frederick “Flee” Lee 
Chief Security Officer at Gusto 
![Feroot healthcare security report summary, November 2023](https://www.feroot.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/healthcare-websites-security-report-summary-feroot-2023.png)

Get Beware of Pixels and Trackers Report to review Blindspots that increase Privacy and Security Risks.
Discover the ways data brokers are using your website to collect private information from your customers, and what to do about it.
##  It’s time to protect your website with Feroot today. 
[ Start Free Website Assessment ](https://www.feroot.com/</free-assessment/>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Feroot Security**

Founded in 2017 and a part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Feroot Security, headquartered in Toronto, Canada, is carving out a significant niche in the realm of digital compliance and security. Their mission centers around providing an AI-powered compliance platform that seamlessly integrates with B2B websites to facilitate adherence to a myriad of regulations including PCI DSS 4.0.1, CCPA, HIPAA, and CIPA, among over 50 other laws governing data privacy.

**What They Do**

Feroot simplifies the complex landscape of compliance by offering solutions that ensure organizations meet strict digital security requirements. Their platform, branded Feroot GRC AI, empowers companies to automate compliance processes while enhancing website security against threats posed by third-party scripts and tracking technologies.

**Key Products:**
- **PaymentGuard AI:** Designed specifically to protect payment pages by ensuring PCI compliance.
- **HealthData Shield AI:** Focused on safeguarding sensitive health information in line with HIPAA regulations.
- **AlphaPrivacy AI:** Enhances data privacy measures for organizations, allowing them to monitor and control data access effectively.
- **CodeGuard AI:** Protects applications from vulnerabilities originating from client-side scripts.

Feroot’s tools enable businesses to maintain continuous compliance with evolving regulations and safeguard customer data, crucial in an era where data breaches are not just costly but can damage reputations irreparably.

**Market Focus and Reach**

The company caters to several key sectors including healthcare, e-commerce, financial services, and SaaS, ensuring that they meet each industry's specific regulatory needs. With a team of 24 dedicated employees, Feroot is actively helping its clients by securing over 3.1 million web pages and protecting more than 2.4 billion visitors to date.

**Current Activities & Resources**

Feroot is focused on educating businesses through resources like the "Beware of Pixels and Trackers Report," designed to unveil blind spots that may lead to privacy and security risks. They offer free website assessments, enabling potential customers to identify risks without any upfront investment. 

**Why Feroot?**

In a digital landscape riddled with evolving threats, Feroot stands out by addressing the security gaps left by traditional security tools, which often overlook client-side vulnerabilities. As pointed out by users, the shift from server-side to client-side security is a critical trend, and Feroot is positioned to lead the charge.

So, if you’re looking to ease the burden of compliance while strengthening your web security, Feroot might just be the partner you need. Check them out at [Feroot.com](https://www.feroot.com) to explore how they can help protect your online presence today.
